snippet.description:
Subscribe for more GTLive action! ►► http://bit.ly/1Oo7KH9 
Missed Part 1? Watch it Now! ►► http://bit.ly/GTLbatman1
How about Part 3? Find it here! ►► http://bit.ly/GTLBatman3

At the end of Episode 3, BatPat completely lost it. Looks like he's headed straight for Arkham Asylum. How will he ever escape? Is Gotham safer with the likes of him locked away for life?

Subscribe & hang out with us every day! ►► http://bit.ly/1Oo7KH9
Follow us on Twitter at @MatPatGT and #GTLive

More GTLive Videos:
Weirdest Quiz Ever | Guess the Wikihow ► http://bit.ly/2gh4IpQ
Teaching Cars to KILL! | Moral Machine ► http://bit.ly/2gMZCT7
Mario Party Star Rush World Premiere ► http://bit.ly/2hmImqz
Higher or Lower Rematch! ►► http://bit.ly/2dlEh6f

Don't have much time but need a quick fix? Check out some of our highlight episodes for hilarious moments from our live streams. Here are a few to get you started.

HiLite: Until Dawn's SPOOPTACULAR!!! ► http://bit.ly/1WSF5uq
HiLite: Flappy Mario Maker? JUST DO IT! ► http://bit.ly/1Oq8GvE
HiLite: FNAF Theorists Surprised By Scott! ► http://bit.ly/1Jrlm3i

Thanks to David Keller for allowing us use of his sound FX:
http://consumingfireartisticcreations.weebly.com/
snippet.title: BATPAT GOES CRAZY! | Batman: The Telltale Series - Episode 4
